title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & more with a dead-simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library (PyPI: ollama) to chat, embed, pull & push models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client (npm: ollama) for Node & browsers (with fetch adapter).

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM & embedding components with one-line install.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (Open-WebUI) for Ollama: chat, PDF, RAG, user/auth, dark theme.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with prompts history, model switching & chat sessions.

title: ollama-copilot (github/raghavdixit99)
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot server for VS Code & JetBrains.

title: ollama-rag (github/thomashacker)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Idiomatic Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and model management.

title: ollama-rs (Rust crate)
summary: Rust client library exposing strongly-typed chat, embed and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-discord (github/rizerphe)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-gui (electron desktop app)
summary: Lightweight Electron wrapper giving Ollama a native chat window with system-tray support.

title: ollama-csharp (github/awaescher)
summary: .NET 8 client library and Source Generator for strongly-typed Ollama interactions.

title: ollama-streamlit (github/svcaf)
summary: Streamlit chat app with model selector, parameter sliders and conversation export.

title: ollama-dagger (Dagger module)
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers and run model tests in pipelines.

title: ollama-helm (Helm chart)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack (github/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration letting pipelines use Ollama generators & embedders via nodes.

title: ollama-rustlang (reddit r/ollama)
summary: Community post announcing ollama-rs v0.3 with streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-hackernews discussion
summary: HN thread comparing Ollama vs llama.cpp performance and GPU memory usage.

title: ollama-nestjs (github/tonystrawberry)
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming for server apps.
